local_intent: Lift the grasped cloth by 0.05 m along z during transfer, ensuring yaw alignment and confirming the object remains held after the lift.
assumptions: Cloth is already grasped and stable from the prior step
End-effector yaw was set to 90 degrees earlier
Sufficient clearance exists to lift 0.05 m without collision
coherence_with_global: Implements the first transfer lift after grasp stabilization in GLOBAL_BT: AtOrientation(90) then MoveDelta(z,0.05,1200) and verifies retention via ObjectInGripper.
